title: Small Utility Trailer
item_description:
Small Utility Trailer

Trailer Details

  • Year: 1993
  • Make: Long Chih Ind Co. LTD
  • VIN: LCAUS0416PT24358U
    • Registration Expiration Date: NA, No Record on File with CA DMV. 
  • Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR): 1000

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 77”
  • Overall Width: 53”
  • Overall Height: 20”
  • Deck Length: 48”
  • Deck Width: 40”
  • Width Between Fenders: 40”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 1
  • Brake Type: None
  • Number of Wheels: 2
  • Tire Size: 4.80-4
  • Electric Plug Type: None
  • Hitch: Other

Note: Bill of Sale only. This item either had one of the following categories: 1) No identification was found on the frame, or 2). The ID or license plate found was verified with the California DMV where no record was found. Therefore, the buyer will receive a Bill of Sale only, which will be mailed 1-2 weeks after the removal ends. Buyer is fully responsible for the new registration process, transfer, fees, and inspections due to DMV to register this item in the Buyer's name if they so choose to obtain a new title/VIN/License/registration.
